hours: Friday: 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
materials: Carpet; Ceramic Tiles; Construction Materials (Reuse); Paint Donation; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
This site is located at the North Coast Marketplace at Mason Road and US Route 250 (just north of the turnpike).
ReStore accepts donations of new and used building materials and fixtures.  This site does not accept the following; broken appliances, rotten or mangled lumber, mattresses, chemicals, and spoiled or used paint.
Items may be brought to the ReStore during open hours or call 419/433-2609 to arrange for a pick-up or for an appointment during non-business hours to drop items at the ReStore.
